title: Getting kicked from champion select
body:
â€‹After joining a Blood Moon queue, I found a game, joined, and selected a champion (Yasuo and Diana). I locked in and waited for the game to start. Once the timer hit 0, I was kicked back into the lobby and got a dodge timer. I don't know what caused it. My hands were off the keyboard, off the mouse, and only a youtube video was going on in the background (on a second monitor) 

This has happened multiple times now and it getting really frustrating cause dodge timer keeps going up. (currently at 30 minutes) 

I would make a bug report, but when I try to submit those, it just give me an error with processing the report.

replies.body:
The symptoms you're experiencing are pretty typical to that of an **unstable connection** to our matchmaking servers. This is typically remedied by working through the steps outlined in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) , as they'll ensure your network settings are compatible with League.

Please let me know if these steps weren't able to resolve the issue.
